user.title: General settings
user.description: Provide the integration name and decide if a workday sensor should be used. You can pick separate entities for today and tomorrow for improved accuracy.

shifts.title: Shift parameters
shifts.description: Define the duration of a single shift and the number of shifts per day.

shift_times.title: Shift start times
shift_times.description: Enter the start time for every shift. The number of fields follows the value from the previous screen.

schedule.title: Schedule pattern
schedule.description: Provide the schedule start date and the recurring pattern. The sequence loops from the start date.

error.workday_required: Select a workday sensor for today.
error.invalid_shift_hours: Shift length must be between 1 and 24 hours.
error.invalid_shifts_per_day: The number of shifts per day must be between 1 and 9.
error.invalid_shift_start_format: Use the HH:MM format for all shift start times.
error.invalid_shift_start_order: Shift start times must be in ascending order without overlaps.
error.invalid_schedule_date: Provide a valid start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
error.invalid_schedule_pattern: The schedule pattern must contain only digits and cannot be empty.
error.invalid_schedule_digit: Schedule digits cannot exceed the number of shifts per day.
